project.objective:
TOPJET s.r.l. was established 26 years ago with the purpose of designing and manufacturing the best production labelling and printing systems for our customers packaging. Our cutting-edge products, has allowed us to compete with the leaders in the industry worldwide, with well-known brand companies.
The SupplePrint Inkjet Printing System is a revolutionary, modular packaging printing machine studied to reduce substantially productions costs, given its real-time printing technology designed to be adaptable to production lines and dedicated projects. This machine increases flexibility and eliminates current systems limitations allowing to switch configurations quickly and easily from one package design, size and material to another, therefore allowing for smaller production batches, greater speed and high-resolution graphics at a lower price.
project.title: Super Productive Line Printing Inkjet
